mapper.select: SELECT cr.congress_reply_id, m.member_id, m.member_name, cr.congress_reply_content, cr.congress_reply_create_date, cr.congress_reply_modify_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes l WHERE l.reply_id = cr.congress_reply_id AND likes_type = 1) AS likesCount FROM congress_reply cr INNER JOIN member m ON m.member_id = cr.member_id INNER JOIN reply r ON r.reply_id = cr.reply_id WHERE cr.reply_id = #{replyId} AND cr.congress_reply_status = 1 ORDER BY cr.congress_reply_index ASC
